headline.print_headline: Costa Concordia Capt Defiant on the Stand
headline.main: Costa Concordia Capt Defiant on the Stand

lead_paragraph: Francesco Schettino, accused by survivors, politicians and the media of dereliction of duty after the 2012 shipwreck of the Costa Concordia cruise liner under his command killed 32, testified in his own defense for the first time Tuesday, defiant and gesticulating under questioning from Italian prosecutors.
